CustomField.description: If the caller is using a SIP device and that SIP device is set to broadcast it hardware details. Those details will be placed here.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the caller is using a SIP or VOIP device and that SIP/VOIP device is set to broadcast its hardware details. Those details will be placed here. If not, this field will be left blank.
CustomField.label: CallerUserAgent
